column2: an A.M. Eatery////I went in on a Thursday morning
column3: after 8.  I took a spot at the bar and was immediately welcomed by Teresa (sp?).  She had asked for my name and then introduced herself. I thought that was the nicest thing! Making it very friendly and inviting! Suffice it to say
column4: service was just excellent.  There was an extremely positive vibe going on in the restaurant as a whole and you couldn't help but smile and be happy.
